Articles.Content:
i'v been playing KSP for over a year now, and i finally joined the forum! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

building huge station and bases, getting to (almost) every planet and moon, modding KSP like crazy and deleting almost all my mods, and more...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

even though i only made an account today, i'v been in the forum almost every day for about 4 months ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

P.S. i might start streaming this weekend and make my own channel on twitch, but no promises ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

P.P.S. how do you change your image ? (silly question, i know ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) but i just can't figure it out XD)

-Shawn.
Welcome aboard! I still have many, many places left to go.

Thanks !

P.S. i still have to land on Moho (that's a tough one)and Tylo (tough one too).

P.P.S. still can't figure out how to add change my image... any suggestions ???
Try slicking "Settings" in the top right, then "Edit Avatar" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
yup, it was the avatar... thanks ! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
